Segment.name: F9
Segment.comment: To identify the rail origin of the shipment

Field.name: FreightStationAccountingCode1
Field.comment: Code (Freight Station Accounting) (AAR Managed Code for Locations)

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode1
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: FreightStationAccountingCode2
Field.comment: Code (Freight Station Accounting) (AAR Managed Code for Locations)

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode2
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode1
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: PostalCode1
Field.comment: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for United States)

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode2
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: PostalCode2
Field.comment: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for United States)
